Kanshudo_mnemonic: you have to wheel around (ãƒ°) the mouth (å£) almost five (äº”) times to tan leather
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This is just bushes with hooks, so a briar patch.  If you want to run through the briar patch unharmed you have to have clothes made from a special tanned hide.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jin inscriptions from "å›—" from two to four " stop ", å›— represents the city, like the shape of the besieged city, it is the first text of " encirclement ". It was later borrowed to represent leather, and is now used as a surname.

Li Xiaoding believes that those who defend the city by themselves means â€œ Wei â€ means â€œ wei â€ for guarding and guarding the city, and â€œ Wei â€ means â€œbeing surrounded â€ by those who defend the city. Early text. " Wei " after the word borrowed expressed Piwei, leather, made " around " the original meaning of the word to indicate that surrounded it. "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Japanese Book A Type 40: "Wei (Wei) City" is written as " Wei ", which can be used as proof.

Oracle bone inscriptions are used as place names and people's names, and inscriptions on bones and bones are used as names of people, but also mean Pi Wei and leather. Creeping duck: "éº€ğ ¦ªWei" means the cooked skin of a doe with patterns. "Zhengzitong": "Wei, soft skin. Cooked is called Wei, and born is called leather."

"Said Wen": "Wei, the opposite is also. From the sound of the å›—å›—. The Wei of the animal skin can be tied to the back of the Wei, so I thought that Pei Wei. All of the Wei belonged to the Wei. ğ£„, the ancient Wen Wei."
humanum_short_description_en: A bronze inscription from " imports " from two to four " only " imports represent cities, all shaped like the siege, is " around the beginning of the text" of. It was later borrowed to represent leather, and is now used as a surname.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[â‘ ]ï¼»wÃ©iï¼½
["Guangyun" Yu Feiqi, Ping Wei, Cloud. ]
Traditional characters for "éŸ¦1".
(1) Animal skins that have been de-haired and cured; soft leather.
(2) Leather rope.
(3) Leather scabbard.
(4) The craftsman of leather in ancient times.
(5) Deviation. The ancient word for "violation".
(6) Through "encirclement". quantifier. It is used to measure the circumference and refers to the length of the tree with its arms together.
(7) Through the "encirclement". Surround
(8) Ancient country name. Short for hogweed. In the Spring and Autumn Period, the old place was in Huaxian County, Henan Province.
(9) Last name.
